meanings.definition: Relating to the sun or solar system.
meanings.sent1: The solars flares were visible in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She studied the solars system in science class.
meanings.sent3: The solars eclipse was a spectacular sight.
meanings.sent4: The solars energy warmed the entire planet.
meanings.sent5: The solars rays illuminated the landscape.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement for solar radiation.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the solars to determine radiation levels.
meanings.sent2: The solars reading was off the charts today.
meanings.sent3: The solars count was crucial for the experiment.
meanings.sent4: The solars data helped predict the weather accurately.
meanings.sent5: The solars intensity varied throughout the day.

meanings.definition: A type of panel that converts sunlight into electricity.
meanings.sent1: The solars on the roof powered the entire house.
meanings.sent2: She installed new solars to save on electricity bills.
meanings.sent3: The solars installation was quick and efficient.
meanings.sent4: The solars generated clean energy for the community.
meanings.sent5: The solars technology improved over the years.
